verses.name: 1 Peter 2:1
verses.text: Wherefore laying aside all malice, and all guile, and hypocrisies, and envies, and all evil speakings,

verses.name: 1 Peter 2:2
verses.text: As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby:

verses.name: 1 Peter 2:3
verses.text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.

verses.name: 1 Peter 2:4
verses.text: To whom coming, as unto a living stone, disallowed indeed of men, but chosen of God, and precious,

verses.name: 1 Peter 2:5
verses.text: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
